Overview

Side Navigation

For homepage and overview pages that require a left navigational menu use the code below to identify the leftnav. The column is assigned the id #leftnav. The ul is assigned the class .leftnav. The .hidden-sm and .hidden-xs classes will hide the left nav in mobile and tablets. Remove those classes if you want the left nav shown for mobile and tablet platforms.

    About

  • NXP Worldwide
  • Link 1
    •  Sub-Link 1
    •  Sub-Link 2
    •  Sub-Link 3
    •  Sub-Link 4
  • Link 2
  • Link 3
  • Link 4
  • NXP
  • About
  • Us

H1 Heading

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sed quasi quod quibusdam nesciunt recusandae in, quisquam deserunt nulla vero. Quidem atque, eligendi, quas eius ipsam provident odit qui sit dicta.

 <div class="row">
  <div class="col-sm-3 hidden-sm hidden-xs" id="leftnav">
    <ul class="leftnav">
    <h2>About</h2>
    <li><a href="#nogo">NXP Worldwide</a></li>
    <li class="selected"><a href="#nogo">Link 1</a>
      <ul>
      <li ><a href="#nogo"><span class="icon-stop2"></span> Sub-Link 1</a></li>
      <li ><a href="#nogo"><span class="icon-stop2"></span> Sub-Link 2</a></li>
      <li ><a href="#nogo"><span class="icon-stop2"></span> Sub-Link 3</a></li>
      <li ><a href="#nogo"><span class="icon-stop2"></span> Sub-Link 4</a></li>
      </ul>
    </li>
    <li><a href="#nogo">Link 2</a></li>
    <li><a href="#nogo">Link 3</a></li>
    <li><a href="#nogo">Link 4</a></li>
    </ul>
    </div>

     <div class="col-sm-9"> 
     <div id="bc">
        <ul>
          <li><a href="http://www.nxp.com">NXP</a></li>
          <li><a href="#nogo">About</a></li> 
          <li>Us</li>
        </ul> 
      </div>
      <h1>H1 Heading</h1>
     <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sed quasi quod quibusdam nesciunt recusandae in, quisquam deserunt nulla vero. Quidem atque, eligendi, quas eius ipsam provident odit qui sit dicta.</p>
   </div>
 </div>

Tabs

For summary pages where tabs are needed use the .tabBar class. The #selectedTab id will be assigned automatically when tab is clicked.

  • Overview
  • Documentation
  • Software & Tools

Heading

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Architecto quae sit nemo aliquid molestiae ipsa ea laborum consectetur, sunt ducimus labore placeat nesciunt voluptate velit neque iste, iusto, ipsum veritatis.


  <div class="row">
    <div class="tabBar">
        <ul>
         <li id="selectedTab"><a href="#nogo">Overview</a></li>
         <li><a href="#nogo">Documentation</a></li>
         <li><a href="#nogo">Software & Tools</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

IU Units

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sed, cupiditate, quae, laborum, natus neque cumque alias nesciunt rerum saepe officia soluta maxime suscipit iste voluptas dolorem nemo assumenda totam iusto.

Tree view

To use this component requires the jquery treeview plugin. It is loaded by the jquery.plus.min.js file

 
<script src="http://cache.freescale.com/shared/js/jquery/jquery.plus.min.js"></script>

Use the .treeview class on the ul. List items can be initially closed or opened. Hitareas are used to control expansion and collapsing the tree branches. List items may or may not contain anchor tags.

  • Link 1
    • Sub Link 1
      • Another Link
      • Here too
    • Sub Link 2

<ul class="treeview">
  <li class="closed expandable"><div class="hitarea collapsible-hitarea"><span class="innericon"></span></div>
    <a href="#nogo" >Link 1</a>
    <ul >
      <li class="closed expandable"><div class="hitarea expandable-hitarea"><span class="innericon"></span></div><a href="#nogo" >Sub Link 1</a>
        <ul>
          <li>Another Link</li>
          <li><a href="#nogo">Here too</a></li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li class="expandable"><a href="#nogo">Sub Link 2</a></li>
     </ul>
   </li>
</ul>
